DOC.detailed_description: This multi-center randomized crossover control feeding study . Briefly , adult men woman recruit Quebec City Winnipeg metropolitan area medium ( newspaper , radio ) , local lipid clinic mail list ( n=90 ) . Participants randomized series 5 experimental diet 4 week : 1- Cheese diet , 2- Butter diet , 3- Carbohydrate ( CHO ) diet , 4- MUFA diet , 5- PUFA diet . Usual energy intake estimate begin study use validated tool . Experimental diet provide part full feeding protocol carefully control isocaloric condition maintain body weight constant . All meal food provide participant control energy macronutrient intake optimize . The breakfast meal represent approximately 30 % daily energy intake whereas lunch dinner meal provide 35 % daily energy intake . Participants instructed consume entire meal . A seven-day cyclic menu use . The diet separate washout period 4 week . Blood sample collect two consecutive day dietary phase . The mean two consecutive measurement use analysis .
DOC.criteria: Men woman age 18 65 year Waist circumference > 80.0 cm woman > 94.0 cm men Plasma concentration triglyceride > 1.70 mmol / L Stable weight 6 month start study ( +/ 5lbs ) Men woman age 18 year 65 year History CVD , type 2 diabetes dyslipidaemia monogenic Endocrine disorder Smoking Lipid lower medication hypertension medication Food allergy aversion food composition experimental menu Subjects special dietary habit ( e.g . vegetarianism ) Subject calculate Framingham risk cardiovascular disease ( CVD ) > 20 %
